shinyloadtest

Function reference

version 0.1.0

Shiny Load Driver Object

Main R6 Class that drives a test using phantomJS.

Class that extends ShinyDriver from

  • ShinyLoadDriver

Load Test

Main function that conducts a load test.

Run load tests for a Shiny application

  • loadTest

Analyze Event Logs

A load test will return a series of event logs. These functions help analzye the logs.

Get errofs from event log

  • getErrors

Get duration for simple event pairs

  • getEventInterval

Return the number of concurrent connections

  • getMaxConcurrent

Get page load times

  • getPageLoadTimes

Get event duration for user interactions with inputs

  • getSetInputTimes

Get successes from event log

  • getSuccesses

Get test duration

  • getTestDurations

Load Test Report

Create load test report from template

  • createLoadTestReport
